entry.title: Jolie
entry.summary: Based in Cph & of Tanzanian descent, @joliekubini explores sounds from Africa & the African diaspora - from beats with highlife samples to gqom sounds, kuduro & beyond. She brings unique selections & has made her mark in a remarkably short time soundcloud.com/joliekubin
entry.content:
Based in Cph & of Tanzanian descent, @joliekubini explores sounds from Africa & the African diaspora - from beats with highlife samples to gqom sounds, kuduro & beyond. She brings unique selections & has made her mark in a remarkably short time

soundcloud.com/joliekubin

entry.title: P(h)onyCat
entry.summary: P(h)onyCat har været resident dj & booker for Relaxpiremental floor på Freqs of Nature (de) og har spillet & arbejdet på store festivaller som: Ozora Festival(HU) Atman Festival (Sri) Modem festival(ch) Samt. dj’et på de Berlinske clubber som Suicide Club, Mensh Meier & Loophole. I 2020 udgav hun en compilation(v/a) på det berlinske Mindwaves Music. Med titlen Pnyø. En 11 Tracks V/A med musik fra bl.a. Karsten Pflum, Sofus Forsberg, BandAne mf. En musikalsk kærligheds erklæring til hendes ungdom i den Aarhusanske elektronika scene i 00’erne P(h)onyCat kommer forbi Sekvens om søndagen med et udsnit af sin pladesamling, fyldt jazz, 90er elektronika, trip hop & andet nostalgisk øre guf. Det blir jazzet & sjov, eftermiddags hygge session. soundcloud.com/matti-p-h-onycat
entry.content:
P(h)onyCat  har været resident dj & booker for Relaxpiremental floor på Freqs of Nature (de)  og har spillet & arbejdet på store festivaller som: Ozora Festival(HU) Atman Festival (Sri) Modem festival(ch) 
Samt. dj’et på de Berlinske clubber som Suicide Club, Mensh Meier & Loophole.

I 2020 udgav hun en compilation(v/a) på det berlinske Mindwaves Music.  Med titlen Pnyø.
En 11 Tracks V/A med musik fra bl.a. Karsten Pflum, Sofus Forsberg, BandAne mf. En musikalsk kærligheds erklæring til hendes ungdom i den Aarhusanske elektronika scene i 00’erne

P(h)onyCat kommer forbi Sekvens om søndagen med et udsnit af sin pladesamling, fyldt jazz, 90er elektronika, trip hop & andet nostalgisk øre guf.
Det blir jazzet & sjov, eftermiddags hygge session.
 

soundcloud.com/matti-p-h-onycat

entry.title: Sarahabibi
entry.summary: Sarahabibi giver dig bind for øjnene og snurrer dig rundt. Når du åbner øjnene igen er du i de varme lande og alting danser omkring dig, i et kalejdoskop af Arabfunk, Habibi funk, Middle eastern groove og Italo disco. spotify mix
entry.content:
Sarahabibi giver dig bind for øjnene og snurrer dig rundt. Når du åbner øjnene igen er du i de varme lande og alting danser omkring dig, i et kalejdoskop af Arabfunk, Habibi funk, Middle eastern groove og Italo disco. 
 

spotify mix

entry.title: Rosenkrantz
entry.summary: Funen-based dj with a passion for the melodic side of techno and house. soundcloud.com/rosenkrantz
entry.content:
Funen-based dj with a passion for the melodic side of techno and house.

soundcloud.com/rosenkrantz

entry.title: Merkula
entry.summary: Merkula has played in Odense, Aarhus and Copenhagen. Making music for over 10 years, and 7 years of techno, she is planning to play some new unreleased tracks no one has heard before. Being a part of Odeology, it was only a given the answer was yes to play elsewhere on Funen. Her music as a mix of gritty heavy bangers to hypnotic evolving tracks. soundcloud.com/merkula
entry.content:
Merkula has played in Odense, Aarhus and Copenhagen. Making music for over 10 years, and 7 years of techno, she is planning to play some new unreleased tracks no one has heard before. Being a part of Odeology, it was only a given the answer was yes to play elsewhere on Funen. Her music as a mix of gritty heavy bangers to hypnotic evolving tracks.

 

soundcloud.com/merkula

entry.title: Tec2nisk
entry.summary: Tec2nisk (ASTA MARI b2B Louie32) Tec2nisk redefine techno with their track selection and genre fluidity. They distinguish themselves from the mainstream, taking listeners on a captivating and unpredictable journey through the depths of electronic music that is as brutal as it is mesmerizing. Prepare for a fusion of hardcore, acid, trance, breakbeat and electro. soundcloud.com/louie32-0/tec2nisk-b2b-mix-1-louie32-asta-mari
entry.content:
Tec2nisk (ASTA MARI b2B Louie32)
Tec2nisk redefine techno with their track selection and genre fluidity. They distinguish themselves from the mainstream, taking listeners on a captivating and unpredictable journey through the depths of electronic music that is as brutal as it is mesmerizing. Prepare for a fusion of hardcore, acid, trance, breakbeat and electro.
 

soundcloud.com/louie32-0/tec2nisk-b2b-mix-1-louie32-asta-mari

entry.title: Matriark
entry.summary: Copenhagen-based producer & DJ, Matriark has justifiably earned her spot in the worldwide clubbing scene. Her music productions and DJing energy reflect the 90s and 00s trance era, but also expand the genre with sentimental value additions of the current era. Being a part of the infamous Bunkerbauer collective, a resident at Den Anden Side, one half of duo PLAZA, co-founder of Megatech Industries and a DRIFT Kyiv resident, the Norwegian artist is currently one of the most reliable trance equipment creators around. soundcloud.com/matriarkcph
entry.content:
Copenhagen-based producer & DJ, Matriark has justifiably earned her
spot in the worldwide clubbing
scene. Her music productions and DJing energy reflect the 90s and 00s
trance era, but also expand the genre with sentimental value additions
of the current era. Being a part of the infamous Bunkerbauer
collective, a resident at Den Anden Side, one half of duo PLAZA,
co-founder of Megatech Industries and a DRIFT Kyiv resident, the
Norwegian artist is currently one of the most reliable trance
equipment creators around.

soundcloud.com/matriarkcph

entry.title: Eline B
entry.summary: Eline B har i flere år produceret undergrundsarrangementer i Odense. Hun er kendt som initiativtageren til Hulen, Odeology og WATERPLZ. Eline ved, hvad et dansegulv har brug for. Hendes mixes bevæger sig mellem house, disco og techno, men på denne seneste sommernat dedikerer hun sig til techno. mixcloud.com/ElineB89
entry.content:
Eline B har i flere år produceret undergrundsarrangementer i Odense. Hun er kendt som initiativtageren til Hulen, Odeology og WATERPLZ. Eline ved, hvad et dansegulv har brug for. Hendes mixes bevæger sig mellem house, disco og techno, men på denne seneste sommernat dedikerer hun sig til techno.

mixcloud.com/ElineB89

entry.title: pace+lead
entry.summary: pace+lead (he/him) is a sound designer by day and electronic experimentalist at night. He’s been a part of the electronic music scene in Odense for years and is a resident DJ at Odeology and Waterplz as well as co-founder of the latter. pace+lead breathes experimentation and has a borderless approach to genres in his own music. His latest EP-release "Escape" is a five track personal therapeutic flee into a universe of contrasts. A euphoric address where fast and rolling grooves live side by side with weird beats and dark pop with distorted vocals. The entanglement of the sonic entities is an industrial landscape driven by emotional expression. This exploration will be further explored in upcoming releases in 2024. Alien sounds, liquidy atmospheres and sticky grooves should be expected to hit your sensory canal system when he’s to be found behind the decks. The subgenres in his sets can vary from tribal techno to trippy trance and hacker electro but hypnosis is always the driving force of the pace+lead ufo. soundcloud.com/paceandlead
entry.content:
pace+lead (he/him) is a sound designer by day and electronic experimentalist at night. He’s

Alien sounds, liquidy atmospheres and sticky grooves should be expected to hit your

soundcloud.com/paceandlead

entry.title: Bilibili
entry.summary: BiliBili forkæler dansegulvets folk med en atmosfære af sexy og groovy prog trance og gammel tech house, der presser de +140 bpm. Efter at have pushet musik hele sit liv, har BiliBili fundet et specielt sted i sig for den nostalgiske halvfemser Goa-lyd og nuller UK-tech scene. Dog skal man regne med at blive overrasket med musik fra adskillige andre scener også - især den franske freetek- og Detroit electro scene. soundcloud.com/bilibilixx
entry.content:
BiliBili forkæler dansegulvets folk med en atmosfære af sexy og groovy prog trance og gammel tech house, der presser de +140 bpm. Efter at have pushet musik hele sit liv, har BiliBili fundet et specielt sted i sig for den nostalgiske halvfemser Goa-lyd og nuller UK-tech scene. Dog skal man regne med at blive overrasket med musik fra adskillige andre scener også - især den franske freetek- og Detroit electro scene. 

soundcloud.com/bilibilixx
